#summary This page mentions basic jest behind AndAndroid - An Android Authoring Tool
#labels Featured

= Introduction =

AndAndroid is an attempt to test out how PowerPoint editing capaibilities can be done on android. The basic requirements include ability to add styled text, lines, boxes and circles.
